label.en: Which value of the Sensor Binary Report will be sent when the door is Opened/Closed.

hint.en: To set which value of the Sensor Binary Report will be sent when the door is Opened/Closed.

label.en: Set the interval time of battery report.

hint.en:
Set the interval time of battery report.
Note:
1, if the value is less than 10, the time unit is second.
If the value is more than 10, the time unit is 4 minutes, which means if the value is more than 10 and less than 240, the interval time is 4 minutes. If the value is more than 240 and less than 480, the interval is 8 minutes.
2, if the current battery report falls below the low battery value (configurable parameter 39), it will send battery report=0xFF.

label.en: To configure which sensor report will be sent when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.

hint.en: To configure which sensor report will be sent when the Sensor is triggered On/Off.

label.en: Sensor Binary Report CC is selected.
Basic Set CC and Sensor Binary Report CC are selected.
Enable/disable wake up 10 minutes when re-power on the Sensor.

hint.en: Enable/disable wake up 10 minutes when re-power on the Sensor.

label.en: Which value of the Basic Set will be sent when the door is Opened/Closed.

hint.en: To set which value of the Basic Set will be sent when the door is Opened/Closed.

Set the low battery value.
(10% to 50%).
